description: Node where Edge begins (see  :ref:`pipes of network <edges_csv>`)
Node where Edge ends (see  :ref:`pipes of network <edges_csv>`)
Label of pipe which got selected from :ref:`network/pipes.csv <invest_pipes>`

Flow direction of pipe: 1 if direction corresponds to the *from_node*/*to_node* notation. -1: opposite direction. 0: no investment. This works only if the setting option *bidirectional_pipes* is set *False*.
